description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Histoire des guerres de la Moscovie, 1601-1610 ... Publié ... d'après les MS. hollandais original de 1610, avec d'autres opuscules sur la Russie, et des annotations par M. le Prince Michel Obolensky et M. le Dr A. van der Linde. [Comprising “Een cort verhael van begin en oorspronck deser tegenwoordighe oorloogen en troeblen in Moscouia,” with a French translation, together with the Latin text of “Descriptio regionum Siberiae” and “Brevis descriptio itinerum ducentium, & fluviorū labentium è Moscoviâ Orientem & Aquilonem versus” and a French translation of the legend of the false Demetrius.]" Author: MASSA, Isaac. Contributor: LINDE, Antonius van der. Contributor: OBOLENSKY, Mikhail Andreevich - Prince Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9454.e.5." Page: 340 Place of Publishing: Bruxelles Date of Publishing: 1866 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002415222 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
